name: Deep Sleep - The Sandman (LD 48)
description:
Description

Deep Sleep is a game where the Sandman needs to keep Ron Piche asleep by all mean necessary. 

If the phone rings, cut it off! 

If a dog barks, silence it!

And do not hesitate to use your magical lullaby to deepen Ron's sleep.

You can switch between AZERTY and QWERTY in the main menu (for the French, by the French).

Controls

WASD or ZSQD -> Move around Ron

I -> Sing a lullaby keep Ron asleep

O -> Get rid of an inconvenience (Phone, Dog)

P -> Catch a bad Dreams

ESC -> Pause Menu
